Welcome to Flipbook

bring your images to life

GIF Animator

Draw a scribble, save it as a 'frame' of a gif, and then put a bunch of them together to create a gif... like an online flipbook.

GifShot

The gif-ification used in this app was imported from the tool 'Gifshot', which has some really cool features like using your webcam to create GIFs. Say cheese!

Angular

This app is written in Angular, connecting to a backend written in Express and Node, with a Mongo database. If only there were some accronym for that stack... something like... ENAM. Nah that's weird. Oh well.
